model_actor:
Policy_actor(
  (fc1): Linear(in_features=33, out_features=64, bias=True)
  (bn1): BatchNorm1d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (fc2): Linear(in_features=64, out_features=64, bias=True)
  (bn2): BatchNorm1d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (fc3): Linear(in_features=64, out_features=4, bias=True)
  (bn3): BatchNorm1d(4, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
)
model_critic:
Policy_critic(
  (fc1): Linear(in_features=37, out_features=64, bias=True)
  (bn1): BatchNorm1d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (fc2): Linear(in_features=64, out_features=64, bias=True)
  (bn2): BatchNorm1d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
  (fc3): Linear(in_features=64, out_features=1, bias=True)
  (bn3): BatchNorm1d(1, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
)

Adam (
